description_txt: stated on August 7, 2012 in a press White House press briefing:
quote_txt: "Gov. Romney himself, with 28 other Republican governors, supported policies that would have eliminated the time limits in the welfare reform law and allowed people to stay on welfare forever."

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2012 in campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney and Bain Capital are to blame in a woman’s premature death when they closed the plant where her husband worked.

description_txt: stated on July 5, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Bill Nelson’s vote for the Affordable Care Act "cuts $500 billion from Medicare to pay for new government programs."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2012 in a guest column:
quote_txt: "This ban will only apply to Oregon commercial fishermen. Washington commercial fishermen would still be allowed to use gillnets on the Columbia River."

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2012 in a campaign mailer:
quote_txt: As Florida secretary of state, Kurt Browning "allowed 1,800 illegal voters to register in Florida."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2012 in an interview posted on BlueJersey.com:
quote_txt: "One of the key things about Leonard Lance is that in 2008, when you look at [the] Project Vote Smart website, he was not for guns. Now he has gone too far to the right, saying that you can carry concealed weapons in national parks."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "Thousands of politicians from across Ohio – along with their relatives, employees and friends – are still eligible to serve" on the proposed redistricting commission.

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2012 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: In June 2012 "we actually had more people go on Social Security Disability [85,000] ... than the 80,000 jobs that were created."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2012 in a television interview:
quote_txt: President Obama and Nancy Pelosi said "Obamacare" would save money because "they factored in 10 years worth of tax revenue and only six and half years worth of expenses."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "In June, jobless ranks were higher in nearly 90 percent of U.S. cities."

description_txt: stated on August 4, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney opposes requiring employers to cover contraception and would eliminate funding for Planned Parenthood.

description_txt: stated on August 8, 2012 in campaign website statements:
quote_txt: Says he never voted for a "tax increase."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2012 in an announcement at the Ohio State Fair:
quote_txt: "Ninety percent of the topsoil has inadequate moisture to grow crops."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2012 in an article:
quote_txt: "We have reduced funding for education the least. They've suffered the least cuts."

description_txt: stated on August 6, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Under Obama’s plan (for welfare), you wouldn’t have to work and wouldn’t have to train for a job. They just send you your welfare check."

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Obama "refuses to recognize Jerusalem" as the capital of Israel.

description_txt: stated on August 5, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "As president, Barack Obama has never visited Israel."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Connie Mack IV has been "a promoter for Hooters with a history of bar room brawling, altercations and road rage."

description_txt: stated on July 31, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Romney would add "trillions" to the deficit while Obama would "cut the deficit by $4 trillion."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Georgia ranks "near the bottom in per capita transportation spending."

description_txt: stated on July 21, 2012 in a debate.:
quote_txt: "When I left the Senate, we were on a trajectory towards a balanced budget."

description_txt: stated on July 12, 2012 in a message via the Internet:
quote_txt: Medicare insurance premiums will be rising to "$120.20 per month in 2013 and $247.00 per month in 2014."

quote_txt: President Obama’s lawsuit claims it is unconstitutional for Ohio to allow servicemen and women extended early voting privileges during the state’s early voting period.

quote_txt: "Without Westside MAX, we’d need to add 2.9 lanes to the Sunset Highway."

quote_txt: Says Gov. Jeb Bush vetoed the "Quiñones Plan" because it was "taxation without representation on a large scale."

quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney did not pay taxes for 10 years.

quote_txt: Says U.S. Rep. Connie Mack IV passed "only one bill" in seven years.

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2012 in in a blog post on his campaign website.:
quote_txt: Says that President Obama said that "Small Businesses Succeed Because of Government."

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "In her nearly decade and (a) half in Congress, Tammy Baldwin has sponsored 105 bills. Only three have been enacted into law."
